organic.title: Contact UCLA: Reach Out to Us Today!
organic.snippet: Have questions? Connect with UCLA's admissions team at 310-825-4321 for personalized assistance. We're here to help you every step of the way!

organic.title: Contact Us - UCLA Undergraduate Admission
organic.snippet: Reach us by phone, mail or in person. We have staff available in our lobby to answer any questions you might have.

organic.title: Contact Us | Administration - UCLA
organic.snippet: Phone, (310) 825-2411. Emergencies, (310) 825-1491. Fax, (310) 825-0414. Mail Code, 140501. Office Hours. Monday - Friday, 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

organic.title: Contacts/Hours | UCLA Registrar's Office
organic.snippet: Visit during Zoom virtual hours, or in person at 1113 Murphy Hall, Monday through Friday from 10 am to 12 noon and 1 to 3 pm, except holidays.

organic.title: Contact Information | UCLA Health
organic.snippet: Please direct all medical inquires or physician referral questions to UCLA Health Call Center at 310-825-2631(Link opens phone app). This UCLA Health site is ...
